name: Shield Mates
description:
Work together with a friend to protect yourself and your shield from the evil alien robots.  Collect the alien juice that they drop when killed and return it to the shield to repair it. While under the shield your health is being restored, but be careful you can damage your own shield.   

If you manage to survive till the end of the wave,  run and  hide under the shield in hope that the shield has enough juice to withstand the final laser blast.

CONTROLS:

Left Joystick (move/aim)*, B (jump), A (shoot)

*move down to drop from a ledge

2 Player only (Requires 2 xbox or similar controllers)
